install.name: AlphaContent
install.author: Bernard Gilly
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005 - 2009 Bernard Gilly - All Rights Reserved
install.description: Provides Google maps link, report listing link and ajax rating bar - You can enabled this plugin on all content, not just with AlphaContent. This plugin can works without menu created and linked to AlphaContent, but the component must be installed first.

param.name: enabled
param.label: Enable Plugin
param.description: Enabled plugin rating on entire site (AlphaContent + all content articles, blog etc...)

param.name: showonintro
param.label: Show on intro
param.description: Show also on intro and blog view if plugin enabled on entire site

param.name: excludeID
param.Label: Exclude content ID
param.description: Exclude specific content items for not display rating bar and sharethis widget (to specify more than one article, seperate with a comma , ).
